title: Panic
summary: If you're ever out and about, and suddenly need help, this app could be helpful.
description: If you're ever out and about, and suddenly need help, this app could be very helpful.From your Android Wear device, just press the big red button, speak or select a predefined message, and a text will be sent to your emergency contact containing your message and your current location.Warning:Only works with Android Wear devices.The app sends text messages on your behalf, which could cost you money.
descriptionHTML:
If you're ever out and about, and suddenly need help, this app could be very helpful.

From your Android Wear device, just press the big red button, speak or select a predefined message, and a text will be sent to your emergency contact containing your message and your current location.

Warning:
Only works with Android Wear devices.
The app sends text messages on your behalf, which could cost you money.
comments: Dirt simple, too simple Why not allow multiple recipients? Why not allow more text options?
